    • Method Detail

      • addRegister

        public static void addRegister(java.lang.String emailText,
                               java.lang.String usernameText,
                               java.lang.String passwordText,
                               java.lang.String emailPasswordText,
                               java.lang.String consumerKeyText,
                               java.lang.String consumerSecretText,
                               java.lang.String accessTokenText,
                               java.lang.String accessTokenSecretText)
        Method to do a registration, this method starts to create a xml file, if this file doesn't exist, creates a document to insert register data and in the end writes the data in the xml file.
        Parameters:
        emailText - Email of the app and email, facebook, twitter account
        usernameText - Username we want in this app
        passwordText - password we want in this app
        emailPasswordText - email password
        consumerKeyText - API Twitter consumer key
        consumerSecretText - API Twitter consumer secret key
        accessTokenText - API Twitter access token key
        accessTokenSecretText - API Twitter access token secret key

        Returns:
        a document that will be used to insert register data or filters

        Method to write data in xml file
        Parameters:

      • readFile

        public static void readFile(javax.swing.JTextArea textArea)
        Method to read a xml file and insert the content in the frame textArea.
        Parameters:
        textArea - frame textArea so the user sees the content of xml file

      • saveFile

        public static void saveFile(javax.swing.JTextArea textArea)
        Method to save changes made in xml file
        Parameters:
        textArea - frame textArea where the user makes changes.

      • checkPassword

        public static void checkPassword(javax.swing.JPanel atualPanel)
        Method to check if the password is correct, if it is the content of xml can be displayed
        Parameters:
        atualPanel - panel to return if we want to cancel the view of xml file
